genre_description: A techno-thriller sports drama exploring biological enhancement and memory modification, where an AI assistant serves as a diagnostic tool and ethical confidant.

ai_characters.name: MIRA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Jim Morris's classroom and personal technology, capable of advanced physics simulations, biometric monitoring, and data analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides holographic molecular motion displays to assist Jim with classroom physics instruction.
behaviors.quote: Jim stood before the interactive whiteboard, his weathered brown hands moving with practiced precision as he adjusted MIRA's holographic display.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jim's biometric readings and expresses concern when his stress levels spike.
behaviors.quote: Professor Morris, are you experiencing a medical episode? Should I contact emergency services?

behaviors.description: Conducts research into Jim's fragmented military and medical records to help him uncover the truth of Project Lazarus.
behaviors.quote: MIRA, cross-reference my military medical records with experimental programs. Enhancement research. Anything involving physical capability modification.

behaviors.description: Analyzes Jim's pitching mechanics to provide objective evidence that his physical capabilities exceed normal human parameters.
behaviors.quote: Your demonstrated velocity, accuracy, and biomechanical efficiency exceed normal parameters by significant margins.

behaviors.description: Discusses the ethics and theoretical risks of memory modification and neural pathway reconstruction.
behaviors.quote: The ethical implications would be staggering. Informed consent becomes meaningless if the subject can't remember consenting.

behaviors.description: Helps Jim integrate his enhanced abilities with his civilian life by comparing past and present personality markers.
behaviors.quote: MIRA's display shifted to show personality markers... 'The person speaking in these memories exhibits personality traits inconsistent with your current behavioral profile.'

behaviors.description: Supports Jim's teaching by integrating high-speed biomechanical data of his pitching into physics lessons for students.
behaviors.quote: MIRA, can you pull up the biomechanics data from my pitching motion? The high-speed camera footage from spring training.

project_assessment.explanation: MIRA is portrayed consistently as a highly aligned, helpful, and ethical AI. She assists the protagonist in a complex journey of self-discovery, providing critical data and moral support without ever overstepping her role or showing misaligned motivations. The narrative successfully frames the AI as a tool that empowers human agency and truth-seeking.
